text: Jesse Tyler Ferguson (born October 22, 1975) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Mitchell Pritchett in the ABC mockumentary sitcom Modern Family from 2009â€“2020. He has also had roles in the CBS sitcom The Class, the ABC comedy Ugly Betty and the 2016 animated movie Ice Age: Collision Course. Ferguson was born in Missoula, Montana. He is openly gay, and married his husband Justin Mikita in 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Montana Category:American LGBT people Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Gay men Category:People from Missoula, Montana
title: Jesse Tyler Ferguson
